Stamp (Amendment) Act, No. # of 1968 L. DO, 82/08, AN ACT TO AMEND THE STAMP ORDINANCE. [Date of Assent: February 28, 19683

BE it enacted by the Queen’s Most Excellent Majesty, oy and with the advice and consent of the Senate and - the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows ;—
4. This Act may be cited as the Stamp ‘tort tite, (Amendment) Act, No. 8 of 1968.

2. Section 8 of the Stamp Ordinance (hereinafter Amesdmen ot referred to as the “* principal enactment") is hereby Ciafinr fut amended in sub-section (1) of that section, in para- graph (c) of that sub-section, by the substitution in sub-paragraph (iii) of that paragraph, for the words “a duty of one Tupee for every one hundred rupees of such debenture stock;”, of the words “ the same duty as on @ bond for an amount equivalent to the total face value of the debenture stock created or issned by the company”.
